text.text:
These tokens make up
the crowd in room 23

These tokens make up
the patrons and
automatons in room 34

-Ls8sWVwv0UJzWl2TOcC.name: Sleep. The creature falls unconscious as if under the effect of a sleep spell

-Ls8spyaUp_zgvSCtkbl.name: Laughter. The creature is overcome by a fit of giggles (because farts are f***ing funny) and is incapacitated

-Ls8sxJRlpmNPg0HjIjj.name: Blindness. Something spicy in the fart leaves the creature blinded

-Ls8t70uYTSKG8xmc1ao.name: A dead scarab beetle the size of your hand.

-Ls8tAIdZz2ZQD3QbHii.name: Two crayons (you choose the colorslook at you go!).

-Ls8tG2v3pAXQIrCwTSM.name: A dead sprite inside a cracked glass bottle.

-Ls8tI6U253iNKT4K_H3.name: A set of musical bone pipes the size of your hand.

-Ls8tKKmxpSg9NRBWesP.name: A gold monocle frame without a lens.

-Ls8tMDDY6e1a28vEQz8.name: A glass eye the size of your hand.

-Ls8tOQMKVr_uDKQIXrx.name: A flask, but it's empty ... too empty.

-Ls8tQu1WbGu4y65Lj_z.name: A vial of blood (you're somehow certain it's your own).

-Ls8teNs3Li_hbJGaHVd.name: Coins are sentient here, and they are aware that they are being traded and hoarded as property.

-Ls8tirQC26XbF9uvE4y.name: The air tastes like lemon but smells like lime.

-Ls8tnLuro_nAgpX7Yat.name: All movement is done in dance.

-Ls8tp1ul_XmrtTSKIt-.name: All light is fluorescent and irritating.

-Ls8tr8CeLCsv-CzqYHv.name: A constant "EEEEEE!!!" whines in the distance.

-Ls8twvSZW5lxvBKDC2j.name: People's hair grows at an accelerated rate here. You can watch it happen if you pay attention.

-Ls8u0SmannSELzxzCPj.name: You are overwhelmed by the certainty that squirrels don't control this dimension.

-Ls8u4T6E7wTHEPtOEZK.name: This is the exit door. Nothing is different in this dimension. You're free!

tableitems.name: Everything smells like licorice. Gross.
Coins are sentient here, and they are aware that they are being traded and hoarded as property.
The air tastes like lemon but smells like lime.
Laughter is backward here.
All movement is done in dance.
All light is fluorescent and irritating.
A constant "EEEEEE!!!" whines in the distance.
All fire is pixelated.
Every surface is slightly bouncy.
People's hair grows at an accelerated rate here. You can watch it happen if you pay attention.
You are overwhelmed by the certainty that squirrels don't control this dimension.
This is the exit door. Nothing is different in this dimension. You're free!

-Ls8uFJHjkzSkBPR17t9.name: A pair of finger-thick, rubbery antennae swing from a rippled sheet of plastic. When you trace your finger on the plastic, a sigil glows brightly, and a material version of that same sigil appears. The material manifestation is made of a dense, flavorless foam.

-Ls8uSag9RtGNPxDwGO8.name: A large, pill-shaped metal object, crisscrossed with straps of black leather, opens to reveal three smooth suede sausages. Each sausage emits a groaning sound at a slightly different pitch when pressed.

-Ls8ub_lEKV1U1dq65C2.name: A complex metal framework adorns a pair of thick goggles that, when worn, show people's faces with the noses and mouths switched. After you take them off, you feel as though your nose and your mouth have been switched on your own face for 5 minutes, even though they're not.

-Ls8umaxDDVEjX_dY-MG.name: A long, curved piece of blown glass with large knobs on either end gleams with an inner light. If it is slid down the length of your leg, it instantly conjures up a pair of pants that would fit a doll.

tableitems.name: A pair of finger-thick, rubbery antennae swing from a rippled sheet of plastic. When you trace your finger on the plastic, a sigil glows brightly, and a material version of that same sigil appears. The material manifestation is made of a dense, flavorless foam.

-LsnREQTIpOhvX-77NTm.name: You are under attack. No one here can be trusted except for the head.

-LsnRHTnE-knuo24IXrk.name: You really love the head. No one is allowed to approach the head. Keep others away at all costs.

-LsnRKw5Cv-Kk2rC0prc.name: This head is unnatural. It makes you sick. Just what does it think it's doing? Kill the head.

-LsnROimIvDP5USUS_b2.name: Everyone's being weird except you. You know that not everyone received the same message. The head has something to do with it.

-Ls8v_50HGZFwHy2TawK.name: Everybody currently standing in the room is now nude. Whered your stuff go? Thats your problem now, champ. (Its in area 6, but dont tell them. Thats right, they have to trudge all the way back there.)

-Ls8vbwQoENHRmUF0c_h.name: An orange tabby cat appears. Aw, it likes you! Every 1d4 minutes, the cat grows another leg out of a random body part. Enjoy your upcoming nightmares.

-Ls8vedT_du2PVyUTQhp.name: The character in the room whos currently annoying you the most turns completely inside out. It hurts a lot but doesnt kill them. They feel this horrific transformation in every molecule of their being. Moving the levers to their previous position restores the character to normal.

-Ls8vjZN1B8EcNTYtj2f.name: A scepter materializes on the ground. A cheap paper tag tied to one of its bulbous ends calls it The Scepter of F***ery. If anyone touches it, tell them its spooookily cold. Thats it. Its not magic and has no special properties besides being vaguely ominous.

-Ls8vo_9UDgNwZRgsBNy.name: Everyone standing in the room is teleported onto the ceiling, then falls back to the floor, taking 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage. Gravity! Shes a fickle mistress.

-Ls8vs9hCj636K68l5De.name: A ficus appears. No, thats not a new monster. Its a legit house plant, set up all neat in a pot. It doesnt do anything special unless the characters try to leave the room without itin which case it screams, Dont leave me here!

"It is the Messiah!"
"Aw. Nope."

-Ls8wexVeom9m26etQ8d.name: Regarding Morty: Annoyance. He can be a real buzzkill.

-Ls8wjf27hh7Klx6VlWa.name: Regarding Summer: Bitterness. I resent that she has a whole life of possibilities before her.

-Ls8wnni2_o2cXnMsr0F.name: Regarding Jerry: Regret. I wish he'd worn a condom.

-Ls8wqm6W_ZVwdus_EFa.name: Regarding Meatface: Memory. We could have been a thing in college. Thanks a lot, Jerry.

-Ls8zVlwc9lDqg7GTIj_.name: A crown constructed entirely out of multicolored gemstones, worth 800 gp. The crown functions as winged boots, except that when its wearer is flying, they feel as though theyre being tugged by the head.

-Ls9-ZH8LYzSdKUsYqc6.name: A tiara carved out of one giant sapphire, worth 900 gp. The wearer can cast the fireball spell (save DC 12) from the tiara. Once used, this feature cant be used again until the next dawn.

-Ls9-bBxz1WHLoZurbus.name: A top hat made of gold, worth 500 gp. This headwear grants its wearer a +5 bonus to all saving throws.

-Ls9-cw1vsTa5eddKzcc.name: A pile of gems rolls around in a bowl whose bottom is sculpted so it can be balanced on ones head. This headwear is worth 1,000 gp and grants its wearer a +5 bonus to all ability checks.

attributes.name: The Lost Dungeon of Rickedness Locations
Things You Can Do On Your Turn
Thank you for purchasing Rick and Morty's: The Lost Dungeon of Rickedness!

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ5q8Bywx4WLfCEZje_desc
attribs.current: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

attribs.name: npc_senses
attribs.current: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 17

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ5tOyLPkMLUTXMIyP_description
attribs.current: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ5tOyLPkMLUTXMIyS_description
attribs.current: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ5tOyLPkMLUTXMIyT_desc
attribs.current: The dragon can breathe air and water.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ5wB4BnPUurWMDsAD_description
attribs.current:
The stirge attaches to the target While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 5, 1d4 + 3, hit points due to blood loss.  
The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. It does so after it drains 10 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the stirge

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ5yp2LYphIJ5nBpt3_description
attribs.current: The spectator shoots up to two of the following magical eye rays at one or two creatures it can see within 90 feet of it. It can use each ray only once on a turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ5yp2LYphIJ5nBpt4_description
attribs.current: The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw, or it cant take reactions until the end of its next turn. On its turn, the target cant move, and it uses its action to make a melee or ranged attack against a randomly determined creature within range. If the target cant attack, it does nothing on its turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ5yp2LYphIJ5nBpt5_description
attribs.current: The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ5yp2LYphIJ5nBpt6_description
attribs.current: The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the spectator is visible to the target, ending the effect on itself on a success.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ5yp2LYphIJ5nBpt7_description
attribs.current: The target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ5yp2LYphIJ5nBpt8_description
attribs.current: The spectator magically creates enough food and water to sustain itself for 24 hours.

attribs.name: repeating_npcreaction_-LrQ5yp2LYphIJ5nBpt9_desc
attribs.current: If the spectator makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, the spectator can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 30 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the spectator. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ65F4aEqwdvoF5oNH_desc
attribs.current: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

attribs.name: npc_senses
attribs.current: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

attribs.name: repeating_npcreaction_-LrQ6ElKKpQ-yLsTJi4m_desc
attribs.current: When a jelly that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new jellies if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new jelly has hit points equal to half the original jelly's, rounded down. New jellies are one size smaller than the original jelly.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6ElKKpQ-yLsTJi4n_desc
attribs.current: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6ElKKpQ-yLsTJi4o_desc
attribs.current: The jelly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ6GmQBgNqD84l3OSp_description
attribs.current: The nothic makes two claw attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ6GmQBgNqD84l3OSr_description
attribs.current: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ6GmQBgNqD84l3OSs_description
attribs.current: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must contest its Charisma, Deception, check against the nothics Wisdom, Insight, check. If the nothic wins, it magically learns one fact or secret about the target. The target automatically wins if it is immune to being charmed.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6GmQBgNqD84l3OSt_desc
attribs.current: The nothic has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ6J5booZmQG7E16s0_description
attribs.current: If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6J5booZmQG7E16s2_desc
attribs.current: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn 't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6J5booZmQG7E16s3_desc
attribs.current: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape DC 13). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6J5booZmQG7E16s4_desc
attribs.current: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6J5booZmQG7E16s5_desc
attribs.current: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQmBbV-PTUGcckMcGi_description
attribs.current: The large mimic can make three attacks: two with its pseudopods and one with its bite.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6MwvD6aE3jUopbCs_desc
attribs.current: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 ft. of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6PimIZs3gljWfoLp_desc
attribs.current: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

attribs.name: npc_senses
attribs.current: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 10

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ6T-mntsZ4iDZW91j_description
attribs.current: The target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking the poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ6T-mntsZ4iDZW91k_description
attribs.current: The target is restrained by webbing As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed - AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6T-mntsZ4iDZW91l_desc
attribs.current: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6T-mntsZ4iDZW91m_desc
attribs.current: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6T-mntsZ4iDZW91n_desc
attribs.current: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LrQ6YbmvdOFLr1mX0zH_description
attribs.current: The flameskull uses Fire Ray twice.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6YbmvdOFLr1mX0zJ_desc
attribs.current: The flameskull sheds either dim light in a 15-foot radius, or bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. It can switch between the options as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6YbmvdOFLr1mX0zK_desc
attribs.current: The flameskull has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6YbmvdOFLr1mX0zL_desc
attribs.current: If the flameskull is destroyed, it regains all its hit points in 1 hour unless holy water is sprinkled on its remains or a dispel magic or remove curse spell is cast on them.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQ6YbmvdOFLr1mX0zM_desc
attribs.current:
The flameskull is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no somatic or material components to cast its spells. The flameskull has the following wizard spells prepared:  
 Cantrip (at will): mage hand 
 1st level (3 slots): magic missile, shield 
 2nd level (2 slots): blur, flaming sphere 
 3rd level (1 slot): fireball

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwA_spelldescription
attribs.current: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again. You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it. The hand cant attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwA_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwB_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwB_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwB_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell creates one more dart for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwC_spelldescription
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwC_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you are hit by an attack or targeted by the magic missile spell

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwD_spelldescription
attribs.current: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you. For the duration, any creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against you. An attacker is immune to this effect if it doesnt rely on sight, as with blindsight, or can see through illusions, as with truesight.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwE_spelldescription
attribs.current: A 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within range and lasts for the duration. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 2d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. As a bonus action, you can move the sphere up to 30 feet. If you ram the sphere into a creature, that creature must make the saving throw against the spheres damage, and the sphere stops moving this turn. When you move the sphere, you can direct it over barriers up to 5 feet tall and jump it across pits up to 10 feet wide. The sphere ignites flammable objects not being worn or carried, and it sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwE_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwE_spelltarget
attribs.current: An unoccupied space of your choice within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwE_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwF_spelldescription
attribs.current: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that arent being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwF_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwF_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LrQ6YhyS8B7bV07gXwF_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.current: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQaVFw41GuVKopBcov_desc
attribs.current:
The mage is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). The mage knows the following spells from the wizard's spell list:

Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, shocking grasp
1st Level (4 slots): charm person, magic missile
2nd Level (3 slots): hold person, misty step

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrQasgG38EFYzVtlKQ8_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action. If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrQasgG38EFYzVtlKQ8_spelltarget
attribs.current: One object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrQaulTT0Tyik91GwQL_spelldescription
attribs.current: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again. You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it. The hand cant attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrQaulTT0Tyik91GwQL_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrQawEMrTS16DZX3oZs_spelldescription
attribs.current: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage, and it cant take reactions until the start of its next turn.   The spells damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrQawEMrTS16DZX3oZs_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature you try to touch

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrQayxKwUdcZBSTq7Ta_spelldescription
attribs.current: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range. It must make a Wisdom saving throw, and does so with advantage if you or your companions are fighting it. If it fails the saving throw, it is charmed by you until the spell ends or until you or your companions do anything harmful to it. The charmed creature regards you as a friendly acquaintance. When the spell ends, the creature knows it was charmed by you.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrQayxKwUdcZBSTq7Ta_spelltarget
attribs.current: A humanoid you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrQayxKwUdcZBSTq7Ta_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrQb-d4FgpwiQFbCiYY_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrQb-d4FgpwiQFbCiYY_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrQb-d4FgpwiQFbCiYY_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell creates one more dart for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.current: Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

attribs.current: A small, straight piece of iron

attribs.current: A humanoid that you can see within range

attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target on additional humanoid for each slot level above 2nd. The humanoids must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

attribs.current: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQlaSSbcxCUW8qLpcT_desc
attribs.current: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn 't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQlaSSbcxCUW8qLpcU_desc
attribs.current: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape DC 13). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQlaSSbcxCUW8qLpcV_desc
attribs.current: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LrQlaSSbcxCUW8qLpcW_desc
attribs.current: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: I like the sound of snapping bones. It relaxes me.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: I must find the Temple of the Golden Chicken. There, the curse of my family can be lifted.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: My greataxe is a family heirloom, and it's by far my most precious possession.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrkp80uT8k1Yc8Nz-3A_description
attribs.current: You have a limited well of stamina you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. You can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LrkpPuhYQZtsckM9hYV_description
attribs.current: While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC. This bonus is already included in your AC.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LrkpgkvlxDblgT1VQhx_description
attribs.current: Thanks to your noble birth, people are inclined to think the best of you. You are welcome in high society, and people assume you have the right to be wherever you are. The common folk make every effort to accomodate you and avoid your displeasure, and other people of high birth treat you as a member of the same social sphere. You can secure an audience with a local noble if you need to.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruvZSKowLtP8-smBNG_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d12, Damage Type: Slashing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lruva5jo7mlJDd4lsct_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 30/120 ft.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: Once abandoned yourself, you would never abandon someone who needs your help.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: I believe in my heart that I am meant for great things.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: All life is precious and should be preserved. (Especially horses.)

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I have blind faith in nigh-omnipotent father figures.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LrkvR98RNlYZZATkChD_description
attribs.current: Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your spells. The saving throw DC to resist a spell you cast is 13. Your attack bonus when you make an attack with a spell is +5. See the rulebook for rules on casting your spells.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LrkvbsiBHd9ZlukZZtS_description
attribs.current: Your healing spells are particularly effective. Whenever you restore hit points to a creature with a spell of 1st level or higher, the creature regains additional hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LrkvoJOicgKXt-omfp0_description
attribs.current: You see in dim light within a 60-foot radius of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness in that radius as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrkw-5jbJeqwHZHueNy_description
attribs.current: Your base walking speed is 35 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrkw5W7CFfPmzzNcOLs_description
attribs.current: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LrkwFCVWBpxGWG6OaHX_description
attribs.current: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed. Magic can't put you to sleep.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LrkwNH3Q-ZxVRkYwL8m_description
attribs.current: You retain the rank of sergeant from your career as a soldier. Lower-ranking soldiers loyal to your military organization defer to you. You can invoke your rank to exert influence over other soldiers and requisition simple equipment or horses for temporary use. You can also usually gain access to friendly military encampments where your rank is recognized.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrkwvDVlpEOp28xPMpG_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action. If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrkwvDVlpEOp28xPMpG_spelltarget
attribs.current: One object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrkwxM1VtQHoJ1zIp5p_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
The spells damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrkwxM1VtQHoJ1zIp5p_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-Lrkwyzdax8fEZf3Ct-7_spelldescription
attribs.current: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following magical effects within range: Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrkxAoi5XqjXzggtMZ5_spelldescription
attribs.current: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrkxAoi5XqjXzggtMZ5_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to three creatures of your choice within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrkxAoi5XqjXzggtMZ5_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrkxDGI8v8nZDL8MZ63_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LrkxDGI8v8nZDL8MZ63_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the Healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruyuLvCvHlDYsHbgu7_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruyxZSg6qP6g029gRN_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lruz94t7pKSHzDayF7-_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Bludgeoning

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruzBvmFTPKKgOnkrAV_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruzDLSvciyPVKTQ5qq_itemcontent
attribs.current: Using a crowbar grants advantage to Strength checks where the crowbar's leverage can be applied.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruzH4wb04A3sCPCtZB_itemcontent
attribs.current: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruzH4wb04A3sCPCtZB_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Adventuring Gear, Damage: 1, Damage Type: Fire, Range: 20/40

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruzIhQg2EsE4riJ1j3_itemcontent
attribs.current: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch - or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel - takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruzKRkOiUDif9-yB01_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruzM1tfvV3fq6CAV-9_itemcontent
attribs.current: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruzNy9W1jcI1pUv98L_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruzRR4en43jvTsMYC7_itemcontent
attribs.current: These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft. Each type of artisan's tools requires a separate proficiency.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruzX9qAZtu7jlIOct4_itemname
attribs.current: Dagger taken from a fallen enemy as a trophy

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LruzkdXkReoQF3DhBVw_itemcontent
attribs.current: A cloth or leather pouch can hold up to 20 sling bullets or 50 blowgun needles, among other things. A compartmentalized pouch for holding spell components is called a component pouch. A pouch can hold up to 1/5 cubic foot or 6 pounds of gear.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: I have trouble saying no to pretty girls... and mad scientists.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: What's mine is yours, and what's yours is mine.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: You know what? What's mine is actually mine. Give it back.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I have problems trusting my allies.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrp0fcYjRDvmdCcsukB_description
attribs.current: You know thieves' cant, a secret mix of dialect, jargon, and code that allows you to hide messages in seemingly normal conversation. You also understand a set of secret signs and symbols used to convey short, simple messages.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrp0ptyTrjM0CeG-Lnm_description
attribs.current: Thanks to your orc blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrp10GnCKrhndmwQ8EM_description
attribs.current: You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrp17cXFwXulX5svyaC_description
attribs.current: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrp1FJM7GadEiZZf4RG_description
attribs.current: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrp1N99Vi9OUEZdsRDM_description
attribs.current: You know the secret patterns and flow to cities and can find passages through the urban sprawl that others would miss. When you are not in combat, you (and companions you lead) can travel between any two locations in the city twice as fast as your speed would normally allow.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrv2ZlId-gKMrvrBZC3_description
attribs.current: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a Dexterity-based attack (such as with your dagger) and you have advantage on the attack roll, you can deal an extra 1d6 damage to your target. You don't need advantage if another enemy of the target is within 5 feet of it and isn't incapacitated. You can't deal the extra damage, however, if you have disadvantage on the attack roll.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv36Dzymt7TYp9ZgQc_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d4, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 20/60

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv38jtYFh8BZ6CCgZK_itemcontent
attribs.current: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv3CbzYBtNsUgGrgo7_itemcontent
attribs.current: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers. Proficiency with these tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv3DwZZriP7-uZwZ6T_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv3GjAxsimA7g8U9p1_itemcontent
attribs.current: For 1 hour, a candle sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv3IruZurZxXlqRKxr_itemcontent
attribs.current: Using a crowbar grants advantage to Strength checks where the crowbar's leverage can be applied.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv3OsbgnxjCahy54FA_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv3Qb3hae-YZoA4eHQ_itemcontent
attribs.current: A hooded lantern casts bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil. As an action, you can lower the hood, reducing the light to dim light in a 5-foot radius.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv3Wii4ZgnhHjto96x_itemcontent
attribs.current: Oil usually comes in a clay flask that holds 1 pint. As an action, you can splash the oil in this flask onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw it up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. Make a ranged attack against a target creature or object, treating the oil as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target is covered in oil. If the target takes any fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute), the target takes an additional 5 fire damage from the burning oil. You can also pour a flask of oil on the ground to cover a 5-foot-square area, provided that the surface is level. If lit, the oil burns for 2 rounds and deals 5 fire damage to any creature that enters the area or ends its turn in the area. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv3Wii4ZgnhHjto96x_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Adventuring Gear, Damage: 5, Damage Type: Fire, Range: 20/60

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv3ZMlFAj3WyLvFRQZ_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv3b58f-7T-ZE7J5O7_itemcontent
attribs.current: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv3dHJf4cCW4zaGkEc_itemname
attribs.current: Dark common clothes including a hood

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: I'm finally smart enough to realize I'll never be good enough.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Power is cool but only if used to protect the innocent.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: I'm finally courageous enough to fight for friends and family.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: No matter how hard you try, you'll lose everything you love.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LrpjxCCxxejD0MuVocL_description
attribs.current: Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for your spells. The saving throw DC to resist a spell you cast is 13. Your attack bonus when you make an attack with a spell is +5. See the rulebook for rules on casting your spells.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrpk6k5vOMfmtHUV-5u_description
attribs.current: You can regain some of your magical energy by studying your spellbook. Once per day during a short rest, you can choose to recover expended spell slots with a combined level equal to or less than half your wizard level (rounded up).

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LrpkWN69QU3QuT2suWA_description
attribs.current: You see in dim light within a 60-foot radius of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness in that radius as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LrpkeR3gnyfgoxGEZeW_description
attribs.current: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed. Magic can't put you to sleep.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrpkk2g2MRzwiBaeEKN_description
attribs.current: When you attempt to learn or recall a piece of lore, if you do not know that information, you often know where and from whom you can obtain it. Usually, this information comes from a library, scriptorium, university, or a sage or other learned person or creature. Your DM might rule that the knowledge you seek is secreted away in an almost inaccessible place, or that it simply cannot be found. Unearthing the deepest secrets of the multiverse can require an adventure or even a whole campaign.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrpnCY5qu1VgvZiXnlO_spelldescription
attribs.current: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again. You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it. The hand cant attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrpnCY5qu1VgvZiXnlO_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrpnDyaXOURixE2X8Gv_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice. You create one of the following magical effects within range: You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor. You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire. You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot. You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour. You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour. You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand and that lasts until the end of your next turn. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LrpnFePUEx0RoKFSxUx_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes 1d8 cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

The spells damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv7ms4Ik18sQXiKyZE_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Bludgeoning, Alternate Damage: 1d8, Alternate Damage Type: Bludgeoning

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv7qxeHcvzZzGj81cX_itemcontent
attribs.current: A component pouch is a small, watertight leather belt pouch that has compartments to hold all the material Components and other Special items you need to cast your Spells, except for those Components that have a specific cost (as indicated in a spell's description).

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv7tD4CpyVKyxEiZFZ_itemcontent
attribs.current: Essential for wizards, a spellbook is a leather-bound tome with 100 blank vellum pages suitable for recording spells.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv7utSjKqpdUPvclMY_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lrv8ALoJDdOgOprfPpx_itemcontent
attribs.current: A cloth or leather pouch can hold up to 20 sling bullets or 50 blowgun needles, among other things. A compartmentalized pouch for holding spell components is called a component pouch. A pouch can hold up to 1/5 cubic foot or 6 pounds of gear.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8mDAneg2PN4CtzZS_spelldescription
attribs.current: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that arent being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8mDAneg2PN4CtzZS_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8nlOAOAZguCtKiFU_spelldescription
attribs.current: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic in this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears magic, and you learn its school of magic, if any. The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8pEeXTGquZqswGzV_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a willing creature who isnt wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The targets base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8pEeXTGquZqswGzV_spelltarget
attribs.current: A willing creature who isn't wearing armor

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8r0-fOXGm57EszPf_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8r0-fOXGm57EszPf_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8r0-fOXGm57EszPf_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell creates one more dart for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8scdsZyLTbPZduih_spelldescription
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8scdsZyLTbPZduih_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you are hit by an attack or targeted by the magic missile spell

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8tqcWvzH5WJomWAY_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber. Roll 5d8; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can affect. Creatures within 20 feet of a point you choose within range are affected in ascending order of their current hit points (ignoring unconscious creatures). Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, each creature affected by this spell falls unconscious until the spell ends, the sleeper takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake. Subtract each creatures hit points from the total before moving on to the creature with the next lowest hit points. A creatures hit points must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected. Undead and creatures immune to being charmed arent affected by this spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8tqcWvzH5WJomWAY_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a cricket

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8tqcWvzH5WJomWAY_spelltarget
attribs.current: Creatures within 20 feet of a point you choose within range (in ascending order of their current hit points, ignoring unconscious creatures)

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lrv8tqcWvzH5WJomWAY_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, roll an additional 2d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: I will have vengeance for my brother's murder and the betrayal that caused it.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: You aren't worth the cost of the arrows it would take to kill you.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I'm kind of a drama bomb.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrpq3ZaC9Txedi7M31a_description
attribs.current:
You have a limited well of stamina you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. You can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.
Once you use this feature, you must take a short or long rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LrpqJ0xuh0uOo1tRC2Z_description
attribs.current: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls you make with ranged weapons. This bonus is already included in your attack with your longbow.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lrpqe5zhRzjrH2T4ncV_description
attribs.current: Since you come from the ranks of the common folk, you fit in among them with ease. You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate among other commoners, unless you have shown yourself to be a danger to them. They shield you from the law or anyone else searching for you, though they will not risk their lives for you.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LrvDuZuUofQD-IXyGs9_itemcontent
attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.
